summary: Frenchman Abel Tiffauges likes children, and wants to protect them against the grown-ups. Falsely suspected as child molester, he's recruited as a soldier in the 2nd World War, but very ... See full summary »
cast: John Malkovich|Armin Mueller-Stahl|Gottfried John|Marianne Sägebrecht|Volker Spengler|Heino Ferch|Dieter Laser|Agnès Soral|Sasha Hanau|Luc Florian|Laurent Spielvogel|Marc Duret|Philippe Sturbelle|Vernon Dobtcheff|Jacques Ciron|Simon McBurney|Patrick Floersheim|Caspar Salmon|Daniel Smith|Ryan O'Leary|Ilja Smoljanski|Lars Albiez|Claude Degen|Thierry Monfray|Jacques Brunet|Sylvie Huguel|Erick Deshors|Jérôme Keen|Lyèce Boukhitine|Christine Paolini|Maximilian Haas|Robert Beyer|Norman Daugs|Joachim Paul Assböck|Bartosz Obuchowicz|Malgorzata Rozniatowska|Piotr Grabowski|Andrzej Szenajch|Lothar Pinnig|Norbert Rakowski|Ilja Zmiejew|Teemu Lahtinen|Pierre-Benoist Varoclier
title: El ogro
